entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 March 2023
